name: Panda Run Volcano - Planet Earth Day Version
name_original: Panda Run Volcano - Planet Earth Day Version
description:
Panda Run Volcano - Planet Earth Day Version is a FREE and fun adventure game!

Help the big clumsy panda to jump with just an easy touch.

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Tap to Jump, double tap for double jump.

Get as far as possible and collect coins - that will give extra points to be on the top of the leaderboard! Invite friends to play for double fun!

Panda Run Volcano - Planet Earth Day Version is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
